backend/main.mo: Actor implementing storage, submission, retrieval, and status updates for consultancy forms and partner registrations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to relevant frontend files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries of various frontend files detailing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode tokens, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app entry configuring TanStack Router routes, layout, providers, and global ScrollToTop.
frontend/src/components/CareerSection.ts: Placeholder or empty file for the career section component.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Placeholder or empty file for the contact section component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with navigation buttons, social links, offerings list, and updated contact details.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with logo, navigation menus, and route handling for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/ScrollToTop.tsx: Scroll-to-top utility that resets scroll on mount and on route changes using router events.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actors based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for submitting forms and fetching consultancy forms, partner registrations, offerings, and solutions via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom CSS variables, themes, utilities, and animation definitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CareersPage.tsx: Static careers page showing company intro, job openings placeholder, and benefits lists.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialSolarPage.t: Renders the commercial solar solutions page with a hero section, business benefits cards, and navigation to the consultancy page.
frontend/src/pages/ExpertConsultancyPage: Provides a hero section and a consultation form that submits user details via a mutation hook with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a solar savings calculator, animated hero content, and navigation to consultancy services.
frontend/src/pages/HybridSystemPage.tsx: Displays information about hybrid solar systems with a hero section and step-by-step explanation, plus navigation to request a quote.
frontend/src/pages/IndustrialSolarPage.t: Shows industrial solar offerings with a hero banner and feature cards emphasizing capacity, storage, and durability, with a link to consultancy.
frontend/src/pages/OffGridSystemPage.tsx: Renders a marketing page describing off-grid solar systems, their workflow steps, and a call-to-action for quotes.
frontend/src/pages/OnGridSystemPage.tsx: Provides an overview of on-grid solar systems with explanations of how they work and a CTA for consultation.
Displays a residential solar solutions page with benefits, visuals, and a consultation button.
frontend/src/pages/SolarAttaChakkiPage.t: Shows a solar-powered atta chakki product page describing benefits and operational advantages.
frontend/src/pages/SolarCalculatorPage.t: Empty placeholder file for a solar calculator page.
frontend/src/pages/SolarWaterPumpPage.ts: Presents a solar water pump product page detailing its features, benefits, and use cases.
frontend/src/pages/TrustedPartnerPage.ts: Implements a partner registration page with a form, validation, submission via a mutation hook, and a hero section with descriptive content.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend styling system.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, existing features, and pending feature requests for the Solar Sparkle application.
